title: Failed to copy: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

I cannot copy files to AWS SFTP transfer files. I believe the issue I am experiencing might be related to this https://github.com/pkg/sftp/issues/305 and should be resolved here https://github.com/pkg/sftp/pull/310. Hopefully updating the `sftp` dependency of `rclone` should resolve the issue.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
 rclone version
rclone v1.50.2
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.13.4
```

and

```
rclone version
rclone v1.50.2-073-ge2773b3b-beta
- os/arch: linux/amd64
- go version: go1.13.4
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Fedora release 31 (Thirty One)

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

AWS SFTP Transfer server

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

rclone copy local.txt aws-sftp-transfer-server:remote.txt

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : local.txt: Failed to copy: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 3 errors and: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : local.txt: Failed to copy: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 3 errors and: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : local.txt: Failed to copy: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 3 errors and: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
2019/12/01 18:56:11 Failed to copy with 3 errors: last error was: Update Create failed: sftp: "Cannot open file in mode: CREATE|READ|TRUNCATE|WRITE" (SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED)
```
